sentences.en: As a child, Elizabeth was very shy and retiring.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白小时候非常腼腆害羞。

sentences.en: Dorothy was joking when she said she was retiring.
sentences.cn: 多罗西说她也要退休,那时闹着玩.

sentences.en: He is a naturally shy and retiring man.
He is a naturally shy, retiring man.
sentences.cn: 他天生腼腆, 不爱交际.

sentences.en: He is watching for an opportunity of retiring quietly.
He must be getting near retiring age.
sentences.cn: 他一定快到退休年龄了.

sentences.en: He's certainly got the right idea, retiring at 55.
sentences.cn: 他真的想通了, 打算55岁就退休.

sentences.en: Her majesty awarded a distinction upon 〔 to 〕 the retiring Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下授勋给行将离任的首相.

sentences.en: I'm retiring next month. They're putting me out to pasture.
sentences.cn: 我下个月退休。他们要我养老去了。

sentences.en: Lillee said he had no regrets about retiring.
Or perhaps your spouse has no intention of retiring, which can cause tension if you assumed you'd spend all your time together.
sentences.cn: 或者，可能你的配偶还没有任何退休的打算，这时，如果你希望与对方共度时光的话，可能会造成关系紧张。

sentences.en: Professor Brown's beginning to slow up; he'll be retiring next year.
sentences.cn: 布朗教授因年老而行动迟缓, 他将明年退休.

sentences.en: Retiring early from his job freed him to join several local clubs.
sentences.cn: 他早早退休,摆脱了工作的羁绊而加入了当地的几个俱乐部.

sentences.en: She was a shy and retiring person off-stage.
sentences.cn: 她在现实生活中是个腼腆而且不善社交的人。

sentences.en: The greatest manager there has ever been, or ever will be in my book, is retiring.
sentences.cn: 这位迄今为止最杰出的，在我看来，也是后人无法超越的经理，就要退休了。

sentences.en: The retiring warden delivered over the keys of the prison to his successor.
sentences.cn: 即将退休的监狱长把监狱的钥匙移交给继任者.

sentences.en: With children independent in economy from home, the core of home economy assure will transfer from protection to the life saving after retiring.
sentences.cn: 随着孩子们在经济上从家庭中独立出来，家庭经济保障的重心将从保护转移到为退休后的生活储蓄。

phrases.tran_cn: 退隐，沉默；(沉湎于自己的思想而)离群索居

trans.tran_cn: 即将退休的，即将离职的，过隐居生活的，害羞的
退职，退役， （使）退休( retire的现在分词 )，退下，撤退，就寝
